name: 'Wii Sports' Quiz / Test | Wii Sports | 10 Questions

questions.text: What buttons must you press on the start screen?
questions.explanation:
A & B.

	Doing this will take you to the sport selection screen. There you can access the sports.

questions.text: What amount of points must you have to reach pro status?
questions.explanation:
1000.

	If you achieve pro status on bowling you get a special ball. If you get pro on boxing you get silver gloves.

questions.text: What is the best Wii fitness age?
questions.explanation:
20.

	'Wii Fitness' can be accessed on the main page. It is located next to the training exercises.

questions.text: What is the worst Wii fitness age?
questions.explanation:
80.

	You can only do 'Wii Fitness' once a day. You can do it more times if you change the character you use.

questions.text: How many sports can you play?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	They are tennis, baseball, bowling, boxing and golf. You can also do a range of activities.

questions.text: How many training exercises can you do?
questions.explanation:
Fifteen.

	You can do three for each sport. These are based around three attributes.

questions.text: How many sports can you play multiplayer?
questions.explanation:
Five.

	These are tennis, bowling, boxing, golf and baseball. The games are two or four players depending on the game.

questions.text: On golf, what is the maximum amount of holes you can play?
questions.explanation:
Nine.

	You can play three holes on three difficulty levels or a nine hole game. The nine hole game features all the holes.

questions.text: How many exercises must you complete in Wii fitness?
questions.explanation:
Three.

	You must do three to find your stamina, strength and balance. These are based on the sports.

questions.text: In boxing, how many ways can you win?
questions.explanation:
Two.

	You can win by knockout or ref's decision. Ref's decision will only happen if you finish all three rounds.
